# uptimekuma_settings (Data Source)

Read the current Uptime Kuma server settings.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Read the current Uptime Kuma server settings
data "uptimekuma_settings" "current" {}

output "server_timezone" {
  value = data.uptimekuma_settings.current.server_timezone
}

output "keep_data_period_days" {
  value = data.uptimekuma_settings.current.keep_data_period_days
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `check_update` (Boolean) Whether automatic update checks are enabled.
- `chrome_executable` (String) Path to Chrome/Chromium executable for Real Browser monitoring.
- `entry_page` (String) Entry page shown after login (e.g. `dashboard`).
- `id` (String) Settings identifier (always `settings`).
- `keep_data_period_days` (Number) Number of days to keep monitoring data.
- `nscd` (Boolean) Whether NSCD (Name Service Cache Daemon) is enabled for DNS caching.
- `primary_base_url` (String) Primary base URL for the Uptime Kuma instance.
- `search_engine_index` (Boolean) Whether search engines are allowed to index the status pages.
- `server_timezone` (String) Server timezone (e.g. `Europe/Berlin`).
- `steam_api_key` (String, Sensitive) Steam API key for Steam Game Server monitoring.
- `tls_expiry_notify_days` (List of Number) Days before TLS certificate expiry to send notifications.
- `trust_proxy` (Boolean) Whether reverse proxy headers are trusted.
